Unnamed wife }} '''Kip''' is an often referenced, but never seen character on ''[[Friends]]''. He was [[Chandler Bing]]'s old roommate before [[Joey Tribbiani]]. Kip has been given two histories on ''Friends''. In both he was Chandler's roommate before Joey. In "[[The One With The Dozen Lasagnas]]", Chandler tells Joey that Kip ran off and got married. Later, in "[[The One With The Kips]]", where the plot revolves around [[Ross Geller|Ross]] telling [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] he cannot see her anymore because of [[Emily Waltham|Emily]]'s wishes, Rachel says that Kip and [[Monica Geller|Monica]] dated and after they broke up, he was phased out. In "[[The One With The Blackout]]", Joey says that "Chandler's old roommate was Jewish". When putting it together, it is possible that he was Chandler's Jewish roommate who dated Monica before they broke up. After which, despite them all promising to remain friends, he was phased out and then he ran off and got married.
